artist: Artist: Kamisaka Sekka; Artist: Tsukioka Kōgyo
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: accordion folded album with removable plates; blue brocade cover; images of sumptuously dressed Noh actors in various poses; comes with decorative box painted with pine tree and bridge railing
markings: square or rectangular relief seal following signature on each page; LRC of last page: 雪佳 {Sekka}
signed: At lower corner of each page except last: 雪佳筆 {Sekka hitsu}
title: 12 Months of Noh
